title: Spring 2016 Basketball Communications/PR Intern - Pro Sports
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Spring 2016 Basketball Communications/PR Intern Pro Sports Posted/Updated: 10-07-2015 Brief Job Description: Maintaining media lists. Assisting with research, writing and editing of media releases as necessary. Distributing public relations material to staff and fans as requested...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
